titles.title: Lynnette's Law
To make an interstate act to conceal a homicide a Federal offense.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 12/11/2014--Introduced. Lynnette's Law - Amends the federal criminal code to make an interstate act to conceal (or attempt to conceal) a homicide a federal offense punishable by imprisonment for any term of years or for life.
